DOC.detailed_description: Human milk consider golden standard infant formula . In human milk infant formula lipid provide 55 % energy infant represent major nutrient baby . The vast majority lipid human milk compose triacylglycerols ( 98 % total lipid ) remainder percent phospholipid . Triglycerides compose glycerol backbone three fatty acid bound . In human milk , palmitate ( 16:0 ) major long chain saturate fatty acid represent 22 % 26 % total fatty acid , esterify approximately 70 % sn-2 position glycerol backbone . Unsaturated fatty acid oleic acid ( 18:1 ) linoleic acid ( 18:2n-6 ) preferentially esterify 1 3 position . In infant formula major source palmitic acid palm oil palm olein palmitate , however , preferentially external 1,3 position , mono- polyunsaturated fatty acid usually esterify 2-position triacylgycerol . The aim study assess safety efficacy infant formula contain 40 % 50 % , respectively , palmitic acid sn-2 position .
DOC.criteria: healthy newborn infant full term infant ( 37 42 week gestation ) birth weight 2.5 4.5 kg singleton birth infant 's mother elect exclusively formula feed baby , enrollment 4 month age obtain his7her legal representative 's informed consent congenital illness malformation may affect normal growth significant prenatal and/or postnatal disease hospitalization first 14 day life child leave maternity ward receive antibiotic treatment time enrolment newborn whose parents/caregivers expect comply treatment newborn currently participate another interventional clinical trial .
